page.title: 01The Cottesmore Area
page.content: At Cottesmore there are two Schools, one in the village and one on the R.A.F camp.Tornado aircraft set off from the R.A.F base .There are two sets of houses for the people who work on camp.St Nicholas' is an old Church of England church in the village.St Mary's and St Hugh's (Roman Catholic) churches are on the camp.There are ten shops in the village and camp altogether.They sell food,clothes and furniture.There are farms all round the area.One of them is worked by Mr. Hollis and one by Pop our milk man. There are some very old houses in the village and many of them are thatched. The village has a Feast Week each year and the R.A.F camp usually has a Families Day, when there may be a flying display and visiting aircraft are parked on the ground for us to see.
